metadata.title: CVE-2023-45129 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Synapse is an open-source Matrix homeserver written and maintained by theMatrix.org Foundation. Prior to version 1.94.0, a malicious server ACLevent can impact performance temporarily or permanently leading to apersistent denial of service. Homeservers running on a closed federation(which presumably do not need to use server ACLs) are not affected. Serveradministrators are advised to upgrade to Synapse 1.94.0 or later. As aworkaround, rooms with malicious server ACL events can be purged andblocked using the admin API.

criterions.comment: matrix-synapse package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
